Title: Relates to excluding the five New York state veterans homes from certain assessments
Summary: Excludes the five state-run veterans homes from assessments on their gross receipts received from all patient care services and other operating income; directs the Commissioner of Health to apply to the secretary of the Department of Health and Human Services for any necessary waivers pursuant to federal law and regulation.
LawCode: Amd ยง2807-d, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to excluding the five New York state veterans homes from certain assessments
